alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; Guadalupe County; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 3:37PM MST until February 03 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches except between 6 and 12 inches in the Sacramento and Capitan mountains of Lincoln county. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, West Central Highlands, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, Guadalupe County, Eastern Lincoln County, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to Noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; Guadalupe County; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County; West Central Highlands
